alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 11:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Box Elder County through MIDNIGHT MDT... At 1115 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Almo to 20 miles west of Park Valley. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Park Valley, Lynn, Rosette, Yost, Standrod and Grouse Creek. This includes Utah Route 30 between mile markers 38 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
